bibdata.title: Ieee draft standard for design criteria of integrated sensor-based test applications for household appliances
Ieee draft standard for design criteria of integrated sensor-based test applications for household appliances

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This standard defines an integrated framework of the test software for household appliances. It specifies the test environment, the test information as well as the means to acquire the information (either web services or a data-exchange file).

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
